mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lesson(title, event_datetime, price, description, image_url, email_address, owner_id, is_open, estimated_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{eventDatetime}, #{price}, #{description}, #{imageUrl}, #{emailAddress}, #{ownerId}, #{isOpen}, #{estimatedTime})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM lesson WHERE id=#{id} LIMIT 1
SELECT * FROM lesson WHERE owner_id=#{ownerId} AND is_open=true AND event_datetime > now() ORDER BY event_datetime ASC
SELECT * FROM lesson WHERE owner_id=#{ownerId} AND (is_open=false OR now() > event_datetime) ORDER BY event_datetime DESC
SELECT lesson.* FROM lesson INNER JOIN user_apply_lesson ON lesson.id = user_apply_lesson.lesson_id WHERE user_apply_lesson.user_id = #{userId};
mapper.update: UPDATE lesson SET is_open=false WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT lesson.* FROM lesson WHERE owner_id=#{userId} AND event_datetime > now() AND is_open=true ORDER BY event_datetime ASC LIMIT 1
SELECT lesson.* FROM lesson WHERE event_datetime > now() AND is_open=true ORDER BY event_datetime ASC LIMIT 20
SELECT * FROM lesson WHERE title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{query}, '%') AND event_datetime > now() AND is_open=true ORDER BY event_datetime
